storyInfo: She clings to the back of the one who came for her. She does not return.

attributes.content: You even defeated the reinforcements? I shouldn't have expected less from you, Talulah!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: What about all the other Infected?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: They all made it in one piece. The backup safehouse we found really came in great use.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Have you done a headcount yet?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I did. Some of the kids were crying about how one of the older girls hasn't come back yet...
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: It's sad, but this happens fairly often these days. *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Talulah! We found the rest of the patrol unit. Looks like they've just been running away the whole time.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Which way did they go?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: East. Makes me wonder if they'll come across the folks we exiled.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: â€”Talulah?!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: H-Hold on! Talulah, where are you going?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Running
Running.
Boots soaked in freezing, chilling water.
Legs sunk in white, blinding snow.
Forgot to use the sleigh.
Forgot to use the snowmobile.
Melting all the snow.
Dashing in the mud.
A long trail on the earth.
A long trail in the snow.
Cold boring into the lungs.
Pain piercing into the brain.
Running.Running.
An endless snow.
An endless winter.
An endless world.
A drop.
Talulah stopps in her tracks.
Another drop.
Tears drip down the corners of her eyes.
She does not notice the drops she shed.
Alina lies there on the ground.
She grips firmly onto the empty basket in her hand. Her clothes are dyed red with her own blood.
The grass and the mud around her body, once pale white, have been dyed a dark shade no less intense or florid.
The snow keeps falling, relentlessly.
Talu...lah?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Alina...!!!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I didn't... want you to see me like this.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Don't talk. Alina, stop talking... Just don't talk!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We need to stop the bleeding...! Just hang on...!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm... not bleeding anymore... It's just...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: In that case... Let's go! We need to get you to the medics right away for a blood transfusion!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It's okay... Don't worry... It's just... the things I traded for...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Don't worry about those... They aren't important... Let's head back... I'll take you there!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The Draco carries the Elafia on her back. Only now does she notice: this little deer looks so delicate and light, but her weight is so, so unbearably heavy on her back... As heavy as the weight of this whole world.
Stop...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I won't!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Who did it... Who did it... Who did this to you?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Was it the Patrol Unit...?! The villagers?! Those bastards... Those bastards... I'll burn them all... I...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Wait, don't tell me... Was it the Infected we exiled...?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Those ungrateful shitheads... No, no... If the Shieldguards gave them any rations...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah...!
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Alina... I'm listening... Just tell me!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I won't tell you...!
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Why?! Why?! Are you not going to at least give me the chance to avenge you?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You mustn't... Don't you remember what you said to me yourself?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: You mustn't fight for revenge. You've already chosen, Talulah. You've already chosen a path to follow...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Giving up halfway... all because of me...? I won't have it...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Don't hold this against anybody... You mustn't.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: What are you talking about?! What are you saying?! How can I not...? How am I supposed to not hold this against anyone?!!!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You told me yourself...! You said yourself that you can't harbor hatred against anyone... or you'd be... swallowed up... by that old man who placed that curse on you...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: ...Even if those Arts never existed in the first place... Wouldn't you still... be taken over... by all those things that represented who he was?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: You told me that yourself.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Right... Right. But... But... Those people... Those...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...You know where they came from... and why they did that.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: You said it yourself... Those people... aren't our enemies...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Stop... Alina... Don't speak...!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No... Talulah... Everything you said... I remember... so you must remember yourself...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: These aren't the people... you need to crush... It's Ursus... That drove them into that corner...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: It's Ursus... and... the world as it is...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: It's okay... That's enough, Alina... I get it now!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah... There is one thing you can detest... Everything they did, you can scorn.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: But... never hate... anyone.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Do you agree with me...? Do you think what I said... is right? Are our lives... meaningful at all? Ugh... I don't know.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I'm not sure what it was... that we did wrong... but I know very well just what that curse... is all about.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Your rage... can burn down the entire plain... but you mustn't hate...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Alina...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm worried. Talulah, I'm so worried. If I'm not here anymore, you must have Yelena remind you... All this...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Alina, stop! Don't go on! I don't... I don't want you gone. All of you need to be here with me. You, Yelena, Sasha, Eno... All of you...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I don't want to lose any of you...!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah... but all of us...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: All of us met... so that we could part one day.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: The white-haired Draco keeps trudging on in the cold, endless snowfield. On her back, the Elafia girl trembles away, pausing only to take in deep breaths now and then.
Snow drops down from the Elafia's horns. As Talulah slogs along, the snow-covered trees behind her begin to burn alight in silence. She has unknowingly begun to set her path ablaze.
The snowfields before her eyes are vast and endless. On her back, Alina is the only warmth she can feel.
Talulah feels each and every beat of Alina's heart through her back, and they grow weaker and weaker by the moment.
She wants to scream. She wants to cry. She wants to squeeze everything she feels out of her lungs, as though it could erase all this from her body.
But Talulah stays silent the entire time.
Talulah...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: We'll be there soon, Alina... We're almost there!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Don't close your eyes... Don't close your eyes!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It's far...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: You don't... need to lie.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: The snowstorm is growing.
Talu...lah...?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I'm listening, Alina. Tell me. What's the matter?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Snow... is warmer... than I ever imagined.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I still don't... have all the things we talked about... written down.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: It's okay. It's okay, Alina. It doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The children... Eno in particular... You need to...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I'm listening! Go on, Alina... I'm listening!!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You need to... do more... than just talk to him...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: It's getting hot... Talulah...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: ...I don't want to die... I still haven't... your sister...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: You must... live on...
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: This will do it.
Talulah will not remember what happens next.
She has no memories of anything after that.
She melted away each and every last thing she should have remembered, along with the snow.
She leaves behind only a trail of flames, and, with the exception of Alina, everything behind her is burned away in the inferno of her wake.
And Talulah treks on in the snow toward her parting with her dear friend.
Talulah! You're finally back! You didn't answer our calls, whatâ€”
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: ...What... Who's that on your back...?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: She's not breathing! Medic! Get over here, now! Talulah, just hang on...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: ...Talulah?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: (What? She's walking right by... Where is she going?!)
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Talulah, you may be the leader here, but that doesn't make it any less serious to leaveâ€”
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Yelena...?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Let her go.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Do you know the poor little girl...?)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (Not really. I think... she's a teacher at the settlement.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Oh, she's a teacher. Poor kids. That's another person they could look up to, gone.)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (But why is Talulah...)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (Everyone has secrets they want to keep to themselves..)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: (Whatever happened, it's hers alone to remember.)
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: With the Elafia still on her back, the Draco walks past the encampment. Their contours slowly begin to blur until they both disappear into the edge of the forest.
No one knows what happened after that.
They could only watch as the Draco walked into the darkness of the night.
